name: Adidas Runners AR X RCB FAN ARMY Community Run
about:
Unite your passion for running and cricket with our AR x RCB Fan Army Community Run! This special collaboration between Adidas Runners (AR) and the RCB Fan Army brings together fitness enthusiasts and cricket fans for an energetic and fun-filled community run.

Who can join:
Open to everyone—whether you’re an AR member, RCB Fan, or simply someone who loves running in a community.

Run together, cheer louder, and celebrate the synergy of fitness and fandom. Join us for this unique and electrifying community event!

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - 5K run + Stretching
about:
Celebrate the spirit of community and empowerment with our With Women We Run (WWWR) - 5K Run + Stretching session! This global campaign encourages women to take strides toward their fitness goals in a supportive and inspiring environment.

This session is open to women of all running abilities. Come solo or bring a friend to experience the joy of running in a strong and encouraging community.

name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
about:
Combine strength, endurance, and recovery in our Circuit Training + Easy Run session! This event blends functional strength exercises with a relaxed run, giving you a well-rounded workout to boost your performance and resilience.

Open to runners of all levels looking to enhance their strength and stamina in one dynamic session.

Strengthen, run, and recover—all in one session. Join us to elevate your training routine and have fun doing it!

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.
